requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Atom E3825 or AMD E1-1200APU or equivalant
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760Ti or Radeon HD 8990 or Intel Arc Pro A40/A50 or equivalant
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Display: 1920x1080 @60Hz
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 8500 6 core [6 Thread] @3Ghz / AMD Ryzen 7 7735H @3.2Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 1060 6Gb vRam (60 FPS Low Settings) / AMD RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 21 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Sanguivore uses Unreal Engine 5 Nanite & Lumen, Epic Games recomends a GTX1080 to achive 30fps on full settings. This game is required to be installed on an SSD for best performance.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i9 9900k, 8 core [16 Thread] @3.6Ghz / AMD Ryzen 3900X, 12 core [24 Thread] @3.8Ghz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia RTX 3080 / AMD RX 6900 XT (60 FPS EPIC Settings)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 21 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Headphones recommended
  • Additional Notes: Sanguivore uses Unreal Engine 5 Nanite & Lumen, Epic Games recomends a GTX1080 to achive 30fps on full settings. This game is required to be installed on an SSD for best performance.
